item.title: California Wildfire Analysis
item.description: Purpose What is Wildfire Data Sets Data Exploration Rank of Wildfire by State Top 10 States affected by Wildfire Length of Wildfire in Days Wild Fire by State Lenght of Wildfire in Days - Chart California - Wildfires by Day California - Wildfires By Month California - Wildfires By Year California - Wildfire Fatalities vs. Property Damage Reference: Purpose The main goal of this analysis to provide insight and prediction using effective visualization and machine learning with NOAA’s data sets.
